casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Chad Evrist HERNDON. No. 88P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th day of February 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Robeson County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
